# Maestro

> AI company building tools that amplify human expertise.

Maestro builds AI-powered products across research infrastructure, behavioral economics, creative automation, and productivity. Based in Singapore, globally delivered. Website at maestro.onl.

## Flagship Product

### RA Suite
Professional research infrastructure for quantitative research. Trusted by 50+ research labs worldwide.

Three integrated services:
- **RA Data**: Turn messy public data sources into paper-ready datasets. Automated cleaning, merging, and visualization pipelines. Supports Stata, R, Python, complex merges, regression output, GIS and spatial analysis, multi-source integration, and replication package audits.
- **RA Website**: Research platforms, experiment interfaces, and lab management systems built for academic workflows. Supports oTree and Qualtrics integration, lab CMS and dashboards, participant management, multi-language support, and interactive data visualization.
- **RA Paper**: Collaborative LaTeX editing with real-time compilation, AI proofreading, Git integration, journal-ready templates, reference management, and figure control.

Stats: 50+ labs supported, 2M+ lines delivered, 100% replication rate.
- URL: https://ra.maestro.onl

## Consumer Products

### Econ
AI-powered behavioral economics experiment platform. Describe experiments in plain language, get fully functional participant-ready websites.
- URL: https://econ.maestro.onl

### PrintPic
Professional passport photo and portrait editing suite. Perfect ID photos in seconds, with automated compliance for 195+ countries.
- URL: https://printpic.maestro.onl

### Kairos
Personal assistant for the right moment. Intelligent agent calendar system that plans and executes tasks through natural language.
- URL: https://kairos.maestro.onl

### Growth Foundry
Growth marketing content platform. Data-driven articles on customer acquisition, retention, SEO, and creator economy strategies.
- URL: https://growth.maestro.onl

### Layout
Creator content toolkit. Convert Markdown to WeChat-ready HTML with multiple themes, auto-save, and inline styling.
- URL: https://layout.maestro.onl

### Rehearse
Multimodal practice and presentation rehearsal platform. Record, review, and refine talks with AI-powered feedback.
- URL: https://rehearse.maestro.onl

## Enterprise Services

- Custom AI Solutions: end-to-end AI product development, requirements analysis, ML integration, full-stack development, deployment and support.
- AI Tools and Integration: workflow automation, data pipelines, API integration, analytics dashboards.
- AI Training and Upskilling: hands-on workshops, AI literacy programs, custom curriculum, certification support.

## Blog Articles

- [AI Agents in 2026: The Year Chatbots Became Autonomous Workers](https://maestro.onl/blog/ai-agents-2026-from-chatbots-to-autonomous-workers): Real data on AI agent frameworks, enterprise deployments, and how autonomous AI workers are transforming business operations.
- [AI Agents for Task Management: Save 28% of Work Time](https://maestro.onl/blog/ai-agents-future-autonomous-task-management): How AI agents automate scheduling, follow-ups, and prioritization to recover the 28% of work time wasted on coordination.
- [AI in Agriculture: How Precision Farming Feeds 10 Billion People](https://maestro.onl/blog/ai-agriculture-precision-farming-food-security): Satellite monitoring, AI-driven irrigation, and precision agriculture transforming food production with real yield and water savings data.
- [AI in Finance: How Hedge Funds Use Machine Learning to Beat Markets](https://maestro.onl/blog/ai-fintech-algorithmic-trading-risk-2026): How AI reshapes algorithmic trading, fraud detection, and risk management with real performance data from Renaissance Technologies and JPMorgan.
- [AI Orchestration in 2026: 94% vs 67% Task Completion](https://maestro.onl/blog/ai-orchestration-why-single-model-not-enough): Why multi-agent orchestration outperforms single LLMs and the architecture behind reliable AI systems.
- [AI in Education: Personalized Learning for 1.5 Billion Students](https://maestro.onl/blog/ai-personalized-education-learning-at-scale): How adaptive learning platforms like Khan Academy and Squirrel AI are closing achievement gaps with measurable outcomes.
- [AI-Powered Data Pipelines for Social Science Research](https://maestro.onl/blog/ai-powered-data-pipelines-social-science-research): Technical deep-dive into building automated research data workflows from ingestion to validation for real-world social science data.
- [How AI Is Reshaping Psychology Research Methods in 2026](https://maestro.onl/blog/ai-reshaping-psychology-research-methods): Computational cognitive modeling, automated qualitative coding, and AI transforming how psychologists design and analyze studies.
- [AI in Retail: How Amazon's Recommendation Engine Drives 35% of Revenue](https://maestro.onl/blog/ai-retail-recommendation-engines-dynamic-pricing): How AI powers personalization, dynamic pricing, and inventory optimization from Amazon to Zara.
- [AI Legal Tech: Contract Review in 26 Seconds vs 92 Minutes by Lawyers](https://maestro.onl/blog/ai-revolutionizing-legal-industry-contract-review): AI achieves 94% accuracy in contract review, outperforming lawyers. Harvey AI valuation, adoption rates, and ethical risks of hallucination.
- [AI Search in 2026: How Perplexity and SearchGPT Challenge Google](https://maestro.onl/blog/ai-search-engines-perplexity-google-future-2026): How Perplexity, SearchGPT, and AI Overviews are reshaping search as 65% of queries end in zero clicks.
- [AI in Manufacturing: Predictive Maintenance Cuts Downtime by 50%](https://maestro.onl/blog/ai-smart-manufacturing-predictive-maintenance): Siemens MindSphere, digital twins, and AI-driven predictive maintenance delivering 10:1 ROI with real-world case studies.
- [AI Startup Growth Benchmarks 2026: From Seed to $100M ARR](https://maestro.onl/blog/ai-startup-growth-metrics-benchmarks-2026): Data-driven ARR milestones, funding round sizes, burn multiples, and pricing model economics from fastest-growing AI companies.
- [AI for Behavioral Economics: 4x Faster Experiments](https://maestro.onl/blog/ai-transforming-behavioral-economics-research): Cut experiment timelines from 6 months to 6 weeks with AI automation for design, recruitment, and analysis.
- [AI in Healthcare 2026: From 95% Diagnostic Accuracy to FDA-Approved Tools](https://maestro.onl/blog/ai-transforming-healthcare-diagnostics-2026): 1,250+ FDA-authorized AI medical devices reshaping diagnostics with 90%+ accuracy in radiology, pathology, and oncology.
- [AI Video Generation in 2026: Sora, Kling, and the $50B Creator Shift](https://maestro.onl/blog/ai-video-generation-sora-kling-creator-economy): AI video generation slashing production costs by 96% and how it reshapes advertising, Hollywood, and the creator economy.
- [Building Replication Packages with AI: A Complete Guide](https://maestro.onl/blog/building-replication-packages-with-ai): Step-by-step guide to building journal-ready replication packages using AI tools to address the replication crisis.
- [DeepSeek vs OpenAI: The Open-Source AI Race Reshaping the Industry](https://maestro.onl/blog/deepseek-vs-openai-open-source-ai-race-2026): DeepSeek trained a frontier model for $5.6M vs OpenAI's $100M+, with benchmarks and enterprise AI strategy implications.
- [The Economist's Toolkit: Essential AI Tools for Empirical Research](https://maestro.onl/blog/economists-toolkit-essential-ai-tools-empirical-research): Comprehensive guide to AI-powered tools across the empirical research pipeline for economics PhD students and researchers.
- [EU AI Act 2026: The Compliance Guide Every AI Company Needs](https://maestro.onl/blog/eu-ai-act-compliance-guide-businesses-2026): Risk classifications, enforcement timelines, penalty structures, and what companies must do before August 2026.
- [The Hidden Cost of Manual Data Processing in Academic Research](https://maestro.onl/blog/hidden-cost-manual-data-processing-academic-research): Quantifying the real cost of data wrangling in academia -- direct RA costs, faculty time, error rates, and modern alternatives.
- [How to Choose an AI Research Data Service: 2026 Buyer's Guide](https://maestro.onl/blog/how-to-choose-ai-research-data-service): Evaluation framework for selecting AI-powered research data services, comparing RAs, freelancers, managed services, and AI solutions.
- [MCP: The USB-C of AI -- Why Anthropic's Protocol Matters](https://maestro.onl/blog/mcp-protocol-anthropic-ai-integration-standard): How Model Context Protocol became the industry standard for AI tool integration with 10,000+ active servers and broad adoption.
- [Singapore Budget 2026 AI Guide: EIS, PSG, and Champions of AI Explained](https://maestro.onl/blog/singapore-budget-2026-ai-guide-eis-psg-champions): Actionable guide to every AI-related initiative in Singapore Budget 2026, including EIS tax deductions and PSG grants.
- [Singapore's National AI Council and What It Means for Enterprise AI](https://maestro.onl/blog/singapore-national-ai-council-enterprise-ai-adoption): Strategic analysis of Singapore's 4 National AI Missions, AI Park, and Champions of AI programme for enterprise adoption.
- [How Singapore SMEs Can Claim 400% Tax Deduction on AI Spending](https://maestro.onl/blog/singapore-smes-claim-400-percent-tax-deduction-ai-spending): Practical deep-dive into the Enterprise Innovation Scheme AI expansion with worked examples and step-by-step claiming process.
- [From Survey Data to Insights: AI Automation for Behavioral Scientists](https://maestro.onl/blog/survey-data-to-insights-ai-automation-behavioral-scientists): AI-powered survey data pipeline walkthrough from raw Qualtrics export to publication-ready results for behavioral scientists.
- [UN Comtrade API: Complete Python Tutorial for Economists (2026)](https://maestro.onl/blog/un-comtrade-api-python-tutorial-economists): Step-by-step guide to downloading bilateral trade data from UN Comtrade API with pagination, rate limits, and working code examples.
- [Vibe Coding: How AI Is Making Everyone a Software Developer](https://maestro.onl/blog/vibe-coding-ai-software-development-revolution): From Andrej Karpathy coining the term to 92% of US developers using AI daily -- GitHub Copilot, Cursor, and what it means for developer jobs.
- [World Bank WITS API: Download Bilateral Trade Data for Research (2026)](https://maestro.onl/blog/world-bank-wits-api-guide-trade-data): How to use the World Bank WITS API to extract bilateral trade flows by HS code with Python examples and WTO validation.
